Class Character

java.lang.Object
fr.citadels.cards.Card
fr.citadels.cards.charactercards.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
Architect, Assassin, Bishop, King, Magician, Merchant, Thief, Warlord
public abstract class Character extends Card implements Comparable<Character>

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Character other)
      CharacterCards comparison is based on their rank (natural ordering of integer). Note : this class has a natural ordering that is inconsistent with equals.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Character>
      Parameters:
      other - the other characterCard to be compared.
      Returns:
      a positive value if this rank is greater than other rank. 0 if there is a tie. a negative value if other rank is greater than this rank.

    • income

      public void income()
      The player gain one gold coin per district of is family he has in his city, if he as a family. The SchoolOfMagic district act as a Noble district.
